#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    long long n,m,s,p,q;
    long long sp,sq,ans;
    while(t--)
    {
        ans=0;
        sp=sq=1;
        cin >> n >> m >> s >> p >> q;
        while(s--)
        {
            sp+=p;
            if(sp>n)
            {
                sp = ((sp-m)%(n-m+1))+m;
            }
 
            sq+=q;
            if(sq>n)
            {
                sq=((sq-m)%(n-m+1))+m;
            }
            //cout << sp << " "<<sq<<"\n";
            if(sp==sq)
            {
              ans++;
            }
        }
        cout << ans << "\n";
 
    }
    return 0;
}
